executable.title: Joint Rician LMMSE Image Filter
executable.description: Filters a set of diffusion weighted images in the mean squared error sense using a Rician noise model. The N closest gradient directions to the direction being processed are filtered together to improve the results. The noise parameter is automatically estimated (noise estimation improved but slower). A complete description of the algorithm may be found in "DWI filtering using joint information for DTI and HARDI", by Antonio Tristan Vega and Santiago Aja-Fernandez (under review).
executable.contributor: Antonio Tristan Vega, Santiago Aja Fernandez. University of Valladolid (SPAIN). Partially founded by grant number TEC2007-67073/TCM from the Comision Interministerial de Ciencia y Tecnologia (Spain).
